titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the World War II posters and newsmaps collection, MS2254
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-05-18 14:38:56 -0400.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.unittitle: World War II posters and newsmaps
did.abstract: This collection contains posters and newsmaps related to World War II.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: World War II posters and newsmaps, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The donor of Series 1 is unknown. Series 2 donated by Michael Beaghen 2019 July 8 (Accession 2019.044)

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains posters and newsmaps related to World War II. The posters are arranged by size and alphabetically within a size range. The posters in Box 3 are all Navy recruiting posters. These appear to have been purchased by Dr. Elmer L. Kayser in his capacity of the University Historian.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: Organized into two series: Posters and Newsmaps for the Armed Forces

did.unittitle: Posters

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains posters related to World War II.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The series contains one folder with 8 newsmaps for the armed forces.

p.li: Vol. I No. 15 August 2, 1942 covering the week of July 24-31
Vol. I No. 20 September 7, 1942 covering the week August 28-September 4
Vol. III No. 26 F October 16, 1944 covering the week of October 4 -11
Vol. III No. 27 F October 23, 1944 covering the week of October 11 -18
Vol. III No. 28 F October 30, 1944 covering the week of October 18-25
Vol. III No. 38 F January 8, 1945 covering the week of December 27, 1944- January 3, 1945
Vol III No. 51 F April 19, 1945 covering the week of March 27 - April 3
Vol. IV No. 1 F April 23, 1945 covering the week of April 10-17

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in no particular order within the folder.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This series contains newsmaps that came to the SCRC rolled. The newsmaps are now stored flat, but users may experience some curling when using and should consider using weights.

did.unittitle: Newsmaps for the Armed Forces
